author: smuzaffar
body: These fixes are needed for DBG IBs. https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/master...smuzaffar:dbg-fix210812?expand=1#diff-4903b0b37950830325ac9459ce58d81069f5361ab58e9183276e83f3810b5822L594-L597 was commented out but https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/1d501128ec65600996facdf18c4699047c52de4b#diff-4903b0b37950830325ac9459ce58d81069f5361ab58e9183276e83f3810b5822L595 enabled it and placed it under `EDM_ML_DEBUG` condition but this does not compile. Please suggest a valid statement to replace it or remove it.
title: [DBG] Fixes needed for 08-12-2300 DBG IB
